## 🧭 Objective:  
Quantify state capacity across empires using fiscal, military, and bureaucratic indicators.
## ✍️ Prompt:  
Which empires show sustained capacity growth? What historical events might explain declines?

## 📥 Load Data
```{r}
state_data <- read_csv("assets/datasets/state_capacity.csv")

state_data <- state_data %>%
  mutate(capacity_index = (tax_revenue + army_size + admin_density) / 3)

ggplot(state_data, aes(x = year, y = capacity_index, color = empire)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "State Capacity Over Time",
       x = "Year", y = "Composite Capacity Index") +
  theme_minimal()
```
